description: This file defines the NotesDbHelper class, which extends SQLiteOpenHelper to manage the creation and upgrade of the notes database schema for a notes application. It contains SQL commands to create the notes table with various columns and indexes, and handles database upgrades by dropping and recreating the table.

classes.name: NotesDbHelper
classes.description: A helper class extending SQLiteOpenHelper to manage database creation and version management for notes storage.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Creates the notes table and indexes in the database if it does not exist.

methods.name: onUpgrade
methods.description: Handles database upgrades by dropping the existing notes table and recreating it.
